price: 19. Y quienes rechacen Nuestras aleyas (y Nuestras pruebas) serán quienes reciban el registro de sus obras con la mano izquierda
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
